title: Chapter 1878 - A Clan’S Predicament
body:
Chapter 1878 - A Clan’S Predicament

His lapels were damp with tea, but the old man in plain cloth robes couldn’t be bothered with that.

He shot to his feet, turned, and left the teahouse, issuing orders at top speed. “Tell His Lordship that the Tyrant Wang Ye has returned from the Eastern Sea. Hurry!”

Whoosh!

The Skyshadow Profound Sparrow beat its knifelike wings and shot through the air, but before it got far, a hand condensed out of soul power closed around it. The Skyshadow Profound Sparrow cried out in alarm and struggled to break free, but in the blink of an eye, it was crushed.

The old man in plain robes was horrified. He raised and was about to shatter a talisman when…

Bang!

A finger struck him on the back of the head. He staggered and fell to the ground face first, like a dog eating shit. Everything went black, and he fell unconscious. Then someone lifted him off the ground, and in a flash, both he and his assailant had vanished.

……

There’s another old-timer hiding nearby? Both Tang Bao’er and Tang Yuyan were stunned, but before they could process that…

Bang!

The old man in plain cloth robes fell from the sky and landed in front of Su Yi like a dead dog.

“Grand...
